page.title: 14FARMING (cont)
page.content: { FARMS IN AND AROUND BALCOMBE {(MACHINERY) } On farms it is important to have machinery.There is all kinds of machinery you can choose from.There are diggers,loaders,tractors and combine harvesters.{Diggers}are not usually used on farms but on road repair although they may be hired or even bought to install gas pipes or something like that.{Loaders}are things that are used to load up hay bales in a shed for the cows to eat in the winter.It has an arm (sometimes extending) onto which you can fit either a shovel bucket,a fork lift or a bale lift.The cab is on the right of the vehicle with the arm in the middle.It can also be used to clear up the farm yard with the shovel bucket.The cab is well protected.The rest of the machinery is on next page.
